mapper.select: select * from sample s left join receive_material r on s.sa_id = r.sa_id where s.state =1 ORDER BY r.appointment_date DESC
select * from sample s left join receive_material r on s.sa_id = r.sa_id where s.state =2 ORDER BY r.appointment_date DESC
mapper.update: update sample set state=2 where sa_id ={#saId}
